name: R2-D2 Adventures
description:
It is a dark time for the Rebellion. The base is under attack and only R2-D2 can save it. Help him to activate all defense systems before it's too late.

Be careful! BB-9E will try in every possible way to sabotage the systems before they are operational.

Repair sabotaged systems before their numbers reach a critical level and the base is destroyed.
